desc: Flow ropes maintains and increases range of motion in the arms, shoulders, and spine. Rope flow utilizes body mechanics in which we normally do not engage. Flow exercise for your mind and body. Start Rope Flow with free training modules now!

layout.text: Turn exercise into play. Anytime. Anywhere
Flow rope helps you start moving again when you’re feeling like a brick, recovering from an injury, or just need to unwind after a long day.
